import React,{useContext}from"react";import{FormDataContext}from"../../contexts/FormDataContext";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../../styles/flowOne/Form.css";// Import your stylesheet here
import{CSSTransition}from"react-transition-group";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StepFive=()=>{const{formData,setFormData}=useContext(FormDataContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handlePrevious=()=>{navigate("/step-four");};const handleNext=(homeOwnership,event)=>{// Get the clicked button element
const button=event.currentTarget;// Add the 'green-active' class to make the button stay green
button.classList.add("green-active");// Convert "Yes" to `1` and "No" to `0`
const homeOwnershipValue=homeOwnership==="Yes"?1:0;// Save to localStorage
localStorage.setItem("home_ownership",homeOwnershipValue);// Update form data in context
setFormData({...formData,homeOwnership});// Determine the next step based on home ownership and delay navigation
setTimeout(()=>{navigate(homeOwnership==="Yes"?"/step-six":"/summary");},400);// Delay for noticeable green effect
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CSSTransition,{in:true,appear:true,timeout:1500,classNames:"fade-slide",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{width:"55%"}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Do You Own Your Home?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`option-button ${formData.homeOwnership==="Yes"?"selected":""}`,onClick:event=>handleNext("Yes",event),children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`option-button ${formData.homeOwnership==="No"?"selected":""}`,onClick:event=>handleNext("No",event),children:"No"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePrevious,children:"Previous"})})]})});};export default StepFive;
